attributes.action: List longer/heavier/more painful periods as a Covid vaccine side effect.
attributes.additional_details: The Astrazenca vaccine now has blood clots listed an official side effect due to blood clots found in those who had the vaccine. However, longer/heavier/more painful periods also seem to be affecting many people and yet this isn’t listed as a side effect, which is leading to health anxiety as women were not aware that this can happen and only find out through social media and friends.
attributes.background: List longer/heavier/more painful periods as a side effect for all Covid vaccinations. Many women are experiencing this and it is causing them great concern as it is not listed as a side effect & these are also symptoms of major health conditions such as cancer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Collecting and analysing data on side effects from covid-19 vaccination, and ensuring possible side effects are communicated in information for vaccine recipients, is the responsibility of the UK medicines regulator, the MHRA. 

You can report suspected side effects to covid-19 vaccination to the MHRA here:
https://coronavirus-yellowcard.mhra.gov.uk/
